error.dirPathConflict: A directory with the same name already exists at this location.

confirmation.title: Delete property?
confirmation.message: This will remove it from all database items and can't be undone.

confirmation.title: Rename property?
confirmation.message: This will update all database items containing this property.

validation.invalidCharacters: Property names may only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and underscores.
validation.nameConflict: A property with this name already exists.

number.name: Number
number.description: A number with various formatting options.

date.name: Date
date.description: A date and time field with various formatting options.

toggle.name: Toggle
toggle.description: An on/off value which can be represented as a checkbox, switch, or icon.

image.name: Image
image.description: An image file or reference to an image item type.

multiselect.name: Multiselect
multiselect.description: A dropdown list of options with multiple selection.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: An icon picker for selecting an icon.

textFormatted.name: Formatted text
textFormatted.description: Richly formatted text edited using a text editor.

created.name: Created date
created.description: Adds the date and time at which an entry was created to its properties.

lastModified.name: Last modified date
lastModified.description: Adds the date and time at which an entry was last modified to its properties.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: You can customise properties after creating the database.

getStarted.title: Choose a template or start from scratch
getStarted.template: Templates are just regular databases with pre-configured properties, designs, and sometimes automations. You can fully edit them to suit your workflow.

errors.nameConflict: A database with this name already exists.
errors.pathConflict: A folder with this name already exists in the at the specified location.

markdown.name: Markdown
markdown.description: Saves database entries as Markdown files.

json.name: JSON
json.description: Saves database entries as JSON files.

yaml.name: YAML
yaml.description: Saves database entries as YAML files.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: A simple database for taking and organising notes with properties for tags, created date, and last modified date.

books.name: Books
books.description: A database for cataloguing books with properties for author, genre, publication date, rating, and cover image.

fetchWebpageMetadata.name: Fetch webpage metadata
fetchWebpageMetadata.description: Fetches the title, description, icon, and image of a webpage.

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete design?
deleteConfirmation.message: This will remove the design from the database and can't be undone. Any views using this design will switch to the default design.

page.name: Page
page.description: The design of an element when displayed as a page.

card.name: Card
card.description: The design of an element when displayed as a card.

list.name: List
list.description: The design of an element when displayed in a list.
